requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Dual Core Processor (i3 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB of Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1 or above
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor (i5 or equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB of Video Ram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600K / Ryzen 3 1300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX 580 / GTX 1060
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
